doc.name: ProcessDirector
doc.description:
The ProcessDirector implements a sequencing model of computation plus process names. The order of execution is given by adding ProcessAttributes to actors in the model.
A ProcessAttribute is a tuple (string processName, int sequenceNumber)
Please see SequencedModelDirector for more details on how the schedule is computed.
doc.author: Elizabeth Latronico (Bosch)
doc.property: Parameter that contains the default list of processes to run.
